title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
The Number of employees of Region Africa India Middle-East is 38.2% smaller than the maximum value at Europe.
